{"title": "Papa's Burgeria", "title_search": "papas burgeria", "title_keyword": "papas burgeria", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/papa-s-burgeria/", "summary": "Grab your spatula and get ready for the biggest burger-flipping adventure on the iPad!
